workflowsoverview: Vue générale des flux de travail
workflows-ui-starter-select-workflow:
Label for dropdown selection widget that allowes workflow seletion.
{{Identical|Select workflow}}
workflows-ui-starter-init-note: Notification text that tells the user, that the user has to fill out the required initialization information
workflows-ui-starter-error-generic: Generic error message when a workflow could not have been started
workflows-ui-starter-dialog-title:
Title of the start workflow dialog.
{{Identical|Start a workflow}}
workflows-ui-starter-action-choose:
Label for the "choose" workflow proccess dialog action.
{{Identical|Choose}}
workflows-ui-starter-action-start:
Label for the "start" workflow proccess dialog action.
{{Identical|Start workflow}}
workflows-ui-starter-action-done:
Label for the "complete" start workflow process dialog action.
{{Identical|Done}}
workflows-ui-starter-action-back:
Label for the "back" workflow proccess dialog action.
{{Identical|Choose another}}
workflows-ui-starter-action-cancel:
Label for the "cancel" workflow proccess dialog action.
{{Identical|Cancel}}
workflows-ui-starter-init-form-fail: Generic error message when the initialization form cannot be retrieved
workflows-ui-action-start:
Label for the content action link that opens a the start workflow dialog.
[[Identical|Start a workflow}}
workflows-ui-alert-action-complete:
Label for button that completes an action.
{{Identical|Complete action}}
workflows-ui-alert-running-workflow-user: Alert message that there is a workflow running on the current page and an action from the user is required.
workflows-ui-alert-running-workflow:
Alert message that there is a workflow running on the current page.
*$1 - Type of workflow that is running on the current page
workflows-ui-task-completion-dialog-titl:
Title of the dialog that allowes the user to take action on the current workflow.
{{Identical|Complete an activity}}
workflows-ui-task-completion-action-comp:
Label for the button that executes the save action in the dialog that allowes the user to take action on the current workflow.
{{Identical|Submit}}
workflows-ui-task-completion-action-canc:
Label for the button that executes the cancel action in the dialog that allowes the user to take action on the current workflow.
{{Identical|Cancel}}
workflows-uto-activity-custom_form:
Label for the workflow activity type "custom_form".
{{Identical|Custom request}}
workflows-uto-activity-user_vote:
Label for the workflow activity type "user_vote".
{{Identical|User vote}}
workflows-uto-activity-group_vote:
Label for the workflow activity type "group_vote".
{{Identical|Group vote}}
workflows-uto-activity-user_feedback:
Label for the workflow activity type "user_feedback".
{{Identical|User feedback}}
workflows-uto-activity-group_feedback:
Label for the workflow activity type "group_feedback".
{{Identical|Group feedback}}
workflows-group-vote-group-empty: Error message when the group name, that has to vote, is not specified
workflows-group-vote-group-no-users: Error message when the specified group has no users to vote
workflows-group-vote-target-title-invali: Error message when the activity target title is invalid or not specified
workflows-group-vote-action-invalid: Error message when the activity action is invalid or not specified
workflows-user-vote-target-title-invalid: Error message when the activity target title is invalid or not specified
workflows-user-vote-owner-invalid: Error message when the activity owner is invalid or not specified
workflows-user-vote-actor-invalid: Error message when the activity actor is invalid or not specified
workflows-user-vote-action-invalid: Error message when the activity action is invalid or not specified
workflows-vote-value-invalid: Error message when the vote value is invalid. The user should be told that only "yes" or "no" would be valid
workflows-delegate-user-invalid: Error message displayed when the given user to whom the vote would be delegated is invalid
workflows-form-label-delegate-cancel:
Label for button that aborts the delegation.
{{Identical|Do not delegate}}
workflows-form-label-delegate:
Label for button that confirms the delegation.
{{Identical|Delegate this task}}
workflows-form-label-delegate-to:
Label for the "delegate_to" user picker dropdown select input.
{{Identical|Delegate to}}
workflows-form-label-delegate-comment:
Label for the "delegate_comment" text area input.
{{Identical|Delegation comment}}
workflows-form-delegate-header-comment:
Instruction text that explains that this task was delegated to the current user by another user and contains the comment of the delegation
*$1 - Name of the user that delegated the task to the curretn user
*$2 - Comment the user gave when delegating this task to the current user
workflows-form-delegate-header:
Title text that explains that this task was delegated to the current user by another user
*$1 - Name of the user that delegated the task to the current user
workflows-form-instructions-loading-text: Text that informs the user that the instructions are loading
workflows-form-edit-request-submit-to-co: Instruction text that explains to the user, that once the user is done editing, the user should click "Submit" to mark the task as completed
workflows-ui-alert-activity-edit-request: Instruction message that informs the user, that the user has been requested to edit the curretn page

Label for button that completes an edit action.
{{Identical|See details}}
workflows-uto-activity-edit-request-head:
Header message for editing activity.
{{Identical|Page edit requested}}
echo-category-title-workflow-cat:
Checkbox label for mail and wiki notification subscription on workflow tasks.
{{Identical|Workflow notifications}}
workflows-pref-tooltip-notification-work: Tooltip for mail and wiki notification subscription on workflow tasks
workflows-notification-user-vote-accept-:
Notification when a user accepted a page.
*$1 - Name of the user that has accepted the page. Use GENDER.
*$2 - The page that was accepted by the user

Subject for notification when a user accepted a page.
*$1 - Name of the user that has accepted the page. Use GENDER.
*$2 - The page that was accepted by the user

Body for notification when a user accepted a page.
*$1 - Name of the user that has accepted the page. Use GENDER.
*$2 - The page that was accepted by the user.
*$3 - Name of the activity that was accepted.
*$4 - Comment of the user that accepted the page
workflows-notification-user-vote-deny-we:
Notification when a user denied a page.
*$1 - Name of the user that has denied the page. Use GENDER.
*$2 - The page that was denied by the user
workflows-notification-user-vote-deny-em:
Subject for notification when a user rejected a page.
*$1 - Name of the user that has rejected the page. Use GENDER.
*$2 - The page that was rejected by the user

Body for notification when a user rejected a page.
*$1 - Name of the user that has rejected the page. Use GENDER.
*$2 - The page that was rejected by the user.
*$3 - Name of the activity that was rejected.
*$4 - Comment of the user that rejected the page
workflows-notification-task-assign-web:
Notification when a user was assigned a task.
*$1 - Name of the task that was assigned to the user.
*$2 - Name of the page, the user was assigned a task on
workflows-notification-task-assign-email:
Subject for notification when a user was assigned a task.
*$1 - Name of the page, the user was assigned a task on

Body for notification when a user was assigned a task.
*$1 - Name of the task, the user was assigned to
workflows-notification-user-vote-delegat:
Notification when a user got a task delegated to.
*$1 - Name of the user that delegated the task to the receiver. Use GENDER.
*$3 - Name of the task that was delegated to the receiver

Subject for the notification when a user got a task delegated to.
*$1 - Name of the user that delegated the task to the receiver. Use GENDER.
*$2 - Name of the page the task is for.
*$3 - Name of the task that was delegated to the receiver

Body for the notification when a user got a task delegated to.
*$1 - Name of the user that delegated the task to the receiver. Use GENDER.
*$2 - Name of the page the task is for.
*$3 - Name of the task that was delegated to the receiver.
*$4 - Comment the user left that delegated the task to the receiver
workflows-notification-ended-web:
Notification when the workflow on a page was completed.
*$1 - Name of the page a workflow was completed for
*$2 - Name of workflow which was completed
workflows-notification-ended-email-sub: Subject for the notification when the workflow on a page was completed.
workflows-notification-ended-email-body:
Body for the notification when the workflow on a page was completed.
*$2 - Reason for aborting
workflows-notification-aborted-web-summa:
Notification when the workflow on a page was aborted.
*$1 - Name of the page the workflow was aborted for
workflows-notification-aborted-email-sub: Subject for the notification when the workflow on a page was aborted.
workflows-notification-aborted-email-bod:
Body for the notification when the workflow on a page was aborted.
*$1 - Name of the page the workflow was aborted for
*2 - Reason for aborting
workflows-notification-due-date-proximit: Notification when a workflow task is due soon
Subject for the notification when a workflow task is due soon

Body for the notification when a workflow task is due soon. Should tell the user that if the due date is reached, the workflow will be automatically aborted
$1 - Name of the page the workflow task is due soon.
*$2 - Name of the task is due soon.
workflows-ui-workflow-overview-dialog-ti:
Title for the workflow overview dialog.
{{Identical|Workflow details}}
workflows-ui-workflow-overview-action-ab:
Label for "abort-arm" action in the workflow overview dialog.
{{Identical|Abort}}
workflows-ui-workflow-overview-action-re:
Label for "restore-arm" action in the workflow overview dialog.
{{Identical|Restore}}
workflows-ui-workflow-overview-action-ca:
Label for "cancel" action in the workflow overview dialog.
{{Identical|Close}}
workflows-ui-workflow-overview-action-ba:
Label for "back" action in the workflow overview dialog.
{{Identical|Back}}
workflows-ui-overview-details-start-time:
Info text for the start date in the workflow overview dialog.
{{Identical|Started on: $1}}.
*$1 - Formatted timestamp of the start date

Header label for the start date column in the workflow overview dialog.
{{Identical|Started on}}
workflows-ui-overview-details-last-time:
Info text for the last activity date in the workflow overview dialog.
{{Identical|Last activity on: $1}}.
*$1 - Formatted timestamp of the last activity date
workflows-ui-overview-details-last-time-:
Header label for the last activity date column in the workflow overview dialog.
{{Identical|Last activity on}}
workflows-ui-overview-details-state-labe:
Info text for the current state in the workflow overview dialog.
{{Identical|State}}
workflows-ui-overview-details-state-colu:
Header label for the current state in the workflow overview dialog.
{{Identical|State}}
workflows-ui-overview-details-state-not_:
Label for the workflow state "no_started".
{{Identical|Not started}}
workflows-ui-overview-details-state-comm: Label for the comment on the current state
workflows-ui-overview-details-end-time:
Info text for the end date in the workflow overview dialog.
{{Identical|Ended on: $1}}.
*$1 - Formatted timestamp of the end date
workflows-ui-overview-details-section-ac:
Label for section that lists the current tasks.
{{Identical|Current tasks}}
workflows-ui-overview-details-section-pa:
Label for the section that shows the subject page.
{{Identical|Subject page}}
workflows-ui-overview-details-no-current: Info text when there is no pending tasks for the current activity
workflows-ui-overview-details-activity-a:
Info text for the currently assigned users in the workflow overview dialog.
{{Identical|Assigned users:}}
Info text if there is no users assigned for the current workflow. Should inform that anyone can complete this task
Info text when the current task is an automatic task and it will be processed in background.
workflows-ui-overview-details-action-abo: Info text that aborting a workflow will immediately stop all ongoing tasks. The user should be asked if the user really wants to abort the workflow
workflows-ui-overview-details-action-res: Info text that restoring a workflow will resume the workflow from the state where it was aborted. The user should be asked if the user really wants to restore the workflow
workflows-ui-overview-details-activity-d:
Label for the due date in workflow details dialog.
{{Identical|Due date}}
workflows-ui-overview-details-action-rea:
Label for textarea input the user needs to fill when the user completes an action.
{{Identical|Reason}}
workflows-ui-overview-details-page-conte:
Label for the button that opens the revision the workflow is related to.
{{Identical|Revision}}

Label for the button that opens the page the workflow is related to.
{{Identical|Page}}
workflows-ui-overview-details-workflow-t:
Header label for the workflow type column
{{Identical|Type}}
workflows-ui-overview-grid-filter-state-:
Label for button that removes any filter and lists all entries in the workflow overview grid.
{{Identical|All}}

Label for button that only lists active entries in the workflow overview grid.
{{Identical|Active}}
workflows-ui-workflow-overview-dialog-ti:
Title for dialog that lists workflows related to current page.
{{Identical|Workflows related to this page}}

Title for dialog that lists Workflows.
{{Identical|Workflows overview}}

Title for dialog that allows aborting a workflow.
{{Identical|Abort workflow}}

Title for dialog that allows restoring a workflow.
{{Identical|Restore workflow}}
workflows-form-instructions-comment:
Label for input field that allows leaving a comment.
{{Identical|Comment}}
workflows-error-generic: Generic error message when an error has occurred
workflows-ui-overview-details-state-auto: Message set as a comment when a workflow was automatically aborted
workflows-auto-aborted-workflow-page-del: Message set as a comment when a workflow was aborted because the page it was related to was deleted
workflows-ui-overview-details-initiator:
Label for button that shows who started the workflow.
{{Identical|Started by}}
workflows-uto-activity-body-initiator:
Info text on who initiated the workflow.
*$1 - Name of the user that initiated the workflow. Use GENDER.
*$2 - Realname of the user that initiated the workflow
workflows-ui-overview-details-action-det: Label for the grid action button
workflows-exception-property-validation:
Validation exception text.
$1 - failed property
$2 - error message from validator
workflows-property-validator-valid-user-:
Exception text when user fails validation
$1 - username
workflows-property-validator-valid-title:
Exception text when title fails validation
$1 - title
workflows-property-validator-required-er: Generic exception message when required value is missing
workflows-property-validator-valid-task-:
Exception text when user cannot execute task assigned
$1 - username
workflows-property-validator-email-recip: Exception text when value cannot be converted to a valid email recipient
workflows-ui-overview-details-section-pa: Section label for the workflow overview
workflows-default-user-feedback-report-s:
Mail subject line for when the user feedback finishes.
$1 - Page name
workflows-default-user-feedback-body:
Mail body text for when the user feedback finishes.
$1 - Start date
$2 - Finish date
$3 - Page name
$4 - Revision ID
$5 - Name of assigned user
$6 - Instructions for assigned user
$7 - Feedback of assigned user
$8 - initiator of workflow
workflows-default-group-feedback-report-:
Mail subject line for when the group feedback finishes.
$1 - Page name
workflows-default-group-feedback-body:
Mail body text for when the group feedback finishes.
$1 - Start date
$2 - Finish date
$3 - Page name
$4 - Revision ID
$5 - List of assigned users
$6 - Instructions for assigned users
$7 - List of feedbacks of assigned users
$8 - initiator of workflow
workflows-collect-data-form-reportrecipi: Label for the workflow form field
workflows-notification-feedback-task-ass:
Wiki notification in case of feedback task assigned to some user.
$1 - Activity name
$2 - Page name
$3 - Initiator of workflow
$4 - Instructions for feedback
workflows-ui-overview-details-raw-data-p:
Label for the table column in activity raw data popup

{{Identical|Property}}

Label for the table column in activity raw data popup

{{Identical|Value}}
Title for the activity raw data popup
workflows-ui-trigger-delete-dialog-title: Title for the delete trigger dialog
workflows-ui-trigger-delete-prompt:
Confirmation prompt for deleting a trigger. 
$1 - trigger key(name)
workflows-ui-triggers-error-delete-fail: Error message when deleting a trigger failed
workflows-ui-trigger-choose-error: Error message when editor for the selected trigger type cannot be instantiated
workflows-ui-triggers-error-persist-fail: Error message when saving a trigger failed
workflows-ui-triggers-add-button: Label for the new trigger button
workflows-ui-workflow-trigger-editor-boo: Dialog title when trigger details booklet page is shown
workflows-ui-trigger-editor-error: Error message when editor for the specified type did not result in an instance of an expected class
workflows-ui-trigger-init-form: Label for the section of the trigger details where initial workflow data is specified
workflows-ui-trigger-manual-workflows: Label for the workflow multiselect widget
workflows-ui-trigger-since-last-major-da: Label for the field selecting number of days
workflows-trigger-ui-condition-include-n: Condition label, include only selected namespaces
workflows-trigger-ui-condition-include-c: Condition label, include only selected categories
workflows-trigger-ui-condition-exclude-e: Condition label, only trigger workflows on major edits
workflows-ui-trigger-item-inactive:
Trigger name label when trigger is inactive.
$1 - trigger name
workflows-activity-editpage-error-no-tit: Workflow exception when EditPage activity received no target title
workflows-activity-editpage-permissionde: L’utilisate{{GENDER:$1|eur|rice}} « $1 » n’a pas de droit de modifier la page « $2 »

Name of activity, which is used in notifications.

Name of activity, which is used in notifications.

workflows-activity-group-feedback-name:
Name of activity, which is used in notifications.
{{Identical|Group feedback}}
workflows-activity-group-vote-name:
Name of activity, which is used in notifications.
{{Identical|Group vote}}
workflows-ui-workflow-overview-initial-d: Label which "hides" workflow initial data in workflow details dialog

Name of workflow step, which is bind to activity.

{{Identical|User feedback}}

{{Identical|Group feedback}}

workflows-activity-set-template-params-n: Error message when template that was requested cannot be found on the page
workflows-activity-error-no-revision: Generic error message when no valid revision can be found
workflows-activity-error-no-title: Generic error message when no title can be found
workflows-activity-cannot-edit:
Generic error message when user cannot edit a page.
$1 - username
$2 - title
workflows-activity-set-template-params-c: Error message when update template cannot be saved
workflows-ui-overview-details-section-de: Label for section workflow details in dialog workflows details page
workflows-ui-overview-details-due-date-l: Label for due date of current task in a workflow
workflows-ui-overview-details-section-as: Label for current assigned user in a workflow
workflows-user-vote-cannot-delegate: Error message when user tries to delegate a task that does not allow delegation
workflows-ui-overview-details-section-ex: Label for the section showing expired activities
workflows-activity-property-due_date:
Label for activity property name
{{Identical|Due date}}
workflows-activity-property-groupname:
Label for activity property name

workflows-activity-property-vote:
Label for activity property name. This property is responsible for vote result. For example, "yes" or "no"
